name: 2023 6th International Conference on Measurement Instrumentation and Electronics
content: Paper Publication: All accepted (Registered & Presented) papers will be collected into ICMIE 2023 Conference Proceedings, which will be published and submitted to IEEE Xplore. Those papers will be indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus and other main academical databases. ★Special Issue★ 1\. Electronics Special Issue: "Physical Diagnosis and Rehabilitation Technologies" High Visibility: indexed within Scopus, SCIE (Web of Science), CAPlus / SciFinder, Inspec, and many other databases. Impact Factor: 2.397 (2020) 5-Year Impact Factor: 2.408 (2020) 2\. Frontiers Research Topic: Diagnosis of Human Pathologies Using Computational Intelligence Techniques and Robotic Rehabilitation Keywords: Diagnosis of Gait Disorders, Neuroscience Physical Diagnosis, Robotic Rehabilitation, Human Pathologies Diagnosis, Computational Intelligence Indexing Services and Repositories: 1Science, CiteFactor, EBSCO, IET Inspec, Scopus, etc.
